group_1.narration: I was in a horrible slump, @and didn’t believe in myself...
But it was your magic words that saved me.

group_1.textLeft: Are you sure you didn't make any adjustments?

group_1.textRight: Yes, I'm certain.

group_1.textLeft: But you said you could adjust our memories. @You guys have gotta be capable of that stuff!

group_1.textRight: Coordinators aren't all-powerful.
Well, there may be some who are, @but in my case...

group_1.textLeft: Is it really that hard?

group_1.textRight: It is... But by telling you I can't @do that here...
I won't be able to pull off this charade for @you next time, can I?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:301350:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wait, so can you actually do it or not?!

group_1.textRight: *Chuckle* @A Coordinator never reveals her secrets.
But I really am telling you the truth: I didn't @perform any sort of Coordination on you.
By waiting to reveal the truth until now...
I hoped you would realize you recovered @because of your own strengths.
All of this was my prescription for restoring your confidence.

group_1.narration: Maybe Yozuru didn’t use literal magic, @the kind that Magical Girls use,
but I think she tapped into @something even stronger...

group_1.textLeft: You’re such a kind person, Yozuru!

group_1.textRight: ...I don’t think that’s true.

group_1.textLeft: What do you mean?

group_1.textRight: During that class, I realized that if you remained @that unconfident...
I would have no chance of making a decent cake.
Then I wouldn't have a suitable Valentine's @Day gift.
I decided that the best solution would be to @deceive you.
My motives were entirely selfish. @I’m sorry that you're so grateful to me.
What I did was not kindness by any measure.

group_1.textLeft: But the fact that you’re making this @confession at all...
Well, it just goes to show that you know @what kindness really is.
At least, that’s what I think?

group_1.textRight: It's hard for me to argue with that.
But...
You think of other people first before you think @of yourself.
It's people with compassion like yours...
Who deserve the title of "kind".
I'm entirely incapable of that sort of kindness.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*

group_1.textRight: *Chuckle*

group_1.textLeft: It doesn't really matter either way, does it?

group_1.textRight: ...You're right.
Maybe this isn't something we need to figure @out here and now.
Alright, this is where we part ways.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you for everything today, Yozuru!

group_1.textRight: See you around. Take care of yourself.

group_1.narration: And then came the big day... @Valentine's Day!

group_1.textRight: Wow...!
[chara:301501:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Dee-lish!! @It's so tasty!

group_1.textLeft: It's totally different from those muffins @back then!

group_1.textRight: They were unique in their own way, weren’t they?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, stop it! @That batch was a total failure.
...Seika?

group_1.textRight: You're eating so quietly...
...It's too good for words...

group_1.textLeft: I didn’t think it was possible for you to be any @more quiet...

group_1.textRight: Hey, hey, Leila! @What kind of magic did you use for this?
Is there some kind of spell that makes a cake @taste really, really good?

group_1.textLeft: Mito...
I think that’s a bit much to ask...
*Giggle*
Well, if I had to guess...
Maybe it was the magic of kindness?

group_1.textRight: ...Kindness?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah!
